}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/2AGR9/KPWL0300 2AGR9KPWL0300] (02/22/2017) - [[Kpnetworks KPWL-300]] {{see also|Acelink EW-7955MN|Acelink EW-7956MAC|Edimax}} *[[Acelink EW-7955MAC]] 4T4R 802.11an/ac [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9984 :Likely used for wireless AC clients (4x SKY85405-11 PAM, black PCB) :"1244-00001046-50Z_ES" and "P/C=F64-113" is silkscreened on the board. *[[Acelink EW-7944MAC]] 4T4R 802.11an/ac [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9990 :Likely used for dedicated backhaul among access points. *[[Acelink EW-7955MN]] 4T4R 802.11bgn [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9984 :Likely used for wireless N clients (2x [[Qualcomm]] Edison QFE1922 PAM) :"1244-00001407-50Z_ES" and "1628" is silkscreened on the blue board.
==Notes== ===Product Overview=== <small> *[[Acelink EW-7955MAC]] 802.11ac 5GHz Solution: :Acelink EW-7955MAC is an 802.11an/ac 5GHz Single-Band Mini PCI express module :based on [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9984 chipset and Skyworks power amplifier. :It supports 4T4R (4x4) technology, which runs up to 1.73Gbps (11ac VHT80 MCS9). :The EW-7955MAC supports 20/40/80MHz and 256-QAM to maximize bandwidth efficiency. *Secure Wireless Connection: :Incorporated with advanced security encryption, such as 64/128-bits WEP, WPA, :WPA2, and 802.1x, it helps prevent users’ devices from malicious attacks. </small> ===Specifications=== *Host Interface: Mini PCIe *Standard: 802.11an/ac *Chipset: [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9984 *Amplifiers: 4x 5GHz RF PAM [[Skyworks]] SKY85405 *Operating Frequency: ISM band: 5.150~5.825GHz *Operation Channels: :5GHz: Country dependent for the following ranges: :36, 40, 44, 48, 52, 56, 60, 64, 100, 104, 108, 112, 116, :120, 124, 128, 132, 136, 140, 149, 153, 157, 161, 165 *Data Rates: 802.11a: 6-54Mbps :802.11n: MCS031, 802.11ac: VHT80 MCS09 *Antenna Connectors: 4x iPEX (U.FL) :Connectors reserved for 5GHz antenna *Operating Voltage: DC 5V *Power Consumption: :Continue TX : 8.84W :Continue RX: 4.5W *Dimensions: 48mm x 73mm
==See also== *[[Acelink EW-7956MAC]] - ''4T4R Wireless 802.11an/ac 1.73Gbps PCIe Module'' *[[Acelink EW-7955MAC]] - Wireless PCIe Module • [http://www.acelink.com.tw/EW-7955MAC.html PPage] :5GHz 4T4R 802.11an/ac (1734 Mbps) - supports 20/40/80MHz and 256-QAM :[[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9984, [[Skyworks]] SKY85405 Front End Module *[[Acelink EW-7944MAC]] - 4T4R 802.11an/ac [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9990 *[[Acelink EW-7955MN]] - Wireless PCIe Module • [http://www.acelink.com.tw/EW-7955MN.html PPage] :2.4GHz 4T4R 802.11bgn (800 Mbps) - supports 20/40MHz and 256-QAM :[[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9984, [[Qualcomm]] Edison QFE1922 Front End Module *[[Acelink EW-7288AC]] - Wireless Range Extender • [http://www.acelink.com.tw/EW-7288AC.html PPage] :5GHz 1T1R 802.11an/ac (150/433 Mbps) - [[Realtek]] RTL8881AM
[[Category:English Documentation]]
